description: Hung from the ceiling in a position he finds all too familiar, Steven Prior waits for the onslaught that follows. Kieron Knight wastes no time in getting to work on the the hanging stallion and starts to flog him all over his body. Kieron stops to reward the boy from time-to-time by swallowing the sword hanging from Steven's groin, then returns to his punishment. After beating Steven into submission Kieron finally brings him to climax, all over the floor.
title: Kieron Knight & Steven Prior
